item.title: GraphTheory
item.description: 图论 正则图(regular graph) 图中所有顶点的度数一样。 生成子图(spanning) 和 诱导子图(induced) 生成子图：具有原图所有的顶点和部分边。 诱导子图：an induced subgraph of a graph is another graph, formed from a subset of the vertices of the graph and all of the edges connecting pairs of vertices in that subset. 图的同构(isomorphism) an isomorphism of graphs G and H is a bijection between the vertex sets of G and H the graph isomorphism is an equivalence relation. 自反(reflexive property)，对称(symmetric property)，传递(transitive property)。 匹配 a matching in a graph is a set of edges without common vertices.
